name: WhatTheFoto
description:
Rules

You need to find a photo of a person matching the description on the form in front of you and paste this photo there.

There are 7 forms and 7 photos of people on the table.

2 photos do not fit the description, but partially correspond to it.

If the description fully corresponds to the photo, you need to click on the "True" button.

If the description partially matches, it is necessary to paste the most appropriate photo and click on the "False" button.

Authors
  • Programming/Visual - Ryavel
  • Programming/Music/Sounds - XDenizX
  • Visual - misterG420
